summary: This is a brief email exchange from June 23, 2019, regarding scheduling a meeting with 'brass' (likely senior officials) about the Epstein case. The sender confirms awareness of the need to meet and discusses Geoff's availability.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Mentioned as someone whose availability affects scheduling a meeting about the Epstein case; he was supposed to be out but will be around and has to call into meetings later in the week.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein meeting
events.description: An email exchange discussing the need to schedule a meeting with senior officials ('brass') regarding the Epstein case, with coordination around Geoff's availability.

keyFacts: Email exchange dated June 23, 2019, concerning the Epstein case.
Discusses scheduling a meeting with 'brass' (senior officials) about the case.
Mentions an individual named Geoff whose availability impacts the meeting schedule.
